Teable GIS System

User Management

Manage system users with bidirectional Teable.io synchronization

Teable.io Role System

This system uses Teable.io's role structure: Owner (full control), Admin (manage users/data), Editor (edit data), Commenter (add comments), Viewer (read-only). Users are automatically synced between Teable.io space and local app_users table.
